Global AccessÂ¶

P allows you to store temporary global data, which will be accessible across the entire app, and will not differ between P clients. P’s global access is a lot like the client-side JavaScript window object.

To access the global object:

P.globe["key"] = "value";
console.log(P.globe["key"]); // "value"
